name: Masque of the Werewolf
description:
A little Halloween spookiness.

Can't really say too much about it or even offer screenshots without spoiling. Just give it a go - it's very short.

Controls: WASD

Made in three days initially for the 'Pre-Fright Check-In' game jam but also being entered in the 'Hell Yeah Poetry Jam' for reasons which will become clear if you play it.

Full credits in the read me file with the download version.
Please DO NOT READ before playing the game.
